name: Double Duet
description:
Double Duet - Demo 0.1

Currently this demo only includes a preselected hand of cards against a NPC opponent with regular rules.

Regular Rules
- Each card has a number along each of its edges. When a card is placed, the numbers along each edge are compared to any adjacent opponent's edges. If the number is higher, the opponent's card is flipped and is then owned by the other player.

- Whichever player has the most cards under their control when there are no longer any moves left is declared the winner.

Planned Features
- Custom Deck Building
- Additional Game Rules
- Unlockable Cards
- Player vs Player (Local / Online)
